articles.title: Azeem Rafiq: Somerset cricketer Jack Brooks under investigation after using discriminatory language - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brooks has apologised to Mills and Stewart Laudat, 50, who played minor counties cricket for Oxfordshire, for addressing them both as 'n***o' in tweets nine years ago.
articles.content:
Jack Brooks avoided serious sanction from Somerset on Thursday for using discriminatory language to two friends - including England star Tymal Mills - in historic social media posts.
Brooks has apol… [+5984 chars]
